name: Group_MultiverseAdventure
description:
Play in full-screen mode.

Player1: Arrow Keys to move; Press M to attack

Player2: WASD to move; Press Q to attack

Credit:

Clint Bellanger, 2013,  Gem Icons, https://opengameart.org/content/gem-icons#
